heading: HB03344
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE PROVINCIAL ROAD FROM THE SAN LORENZO RUIZ JUNCTION WHICH STARTS AT THE MAHARLIKA HIGHWAY IN BARANGAY MAGANG, MUNICIPALITY OF DAET, TRAVERSING BARANGAY CALASGASAN, MUNICIPALITY OF DAET, TO BARANGAYS DACULANGBOLO, DAGOTDOTAN, MAMPUROG, MATACONG AND SAN ISIDRO, UP TO THE BOUNDARY OF CAMARINES NORTE-CAMARINES SUR, ALL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF SAN LORENZO RUIZ, PROVINCE OF CAMARINES NORTE, INTO A NATIONAL SECONDARY ROAD
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2016-08-31

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03344
